\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{\varphi (\theta):} & 0 & {\varphi (A)} & {\varphi (B)} & {\varphi (C)} & 0 \\
	{\theta^k:} & 0 & {A^k} & {B^k} & {C^k} & 0
	\arrow[hook, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\square"{description}, draw=none, from=1-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
